verses.t: Then{G5119} shall the kingdom{G3588} of heaven{G3588} be likened{G3666} unto{G3933} ten{G1176} virgins{G3933}, which{G3748} took{G2983} their{G846} lamps{G3588}, and went{G1831} forth{G1519} to meet{G529} the bridegroom{G3588}.

They that{G3748} were foolish{G3474} took{G2983} their{G1438} lamps{G3588}, and took{G2983} no{G3756} oil{G1637} with{G3326} them{G1438}:
But{G1161} the wise{G5429} took{G2983} oil{G1637} in{G1722} their{G846} vessels{G3588} with{G3326} their{G846} lamps{G3588}.
While{G1161} the bridegroom{G3588} tarried{G5549}, they{G3573} all{G3956} slumbered{G3573} and{G2532} slept{G2518}.

And{G1161} at mid{G3319}night{G3571} there was{G1096} a cry{G2906} made{G1096}, Behold{G2400}, the bridegroom{G3588} cometh{G2064}; go ye{G1831} out{G1519} to meet{G529} him{G846}.??Split mid/night for mesoos nuktos

But{G1161} the wise{G5429} answered{G611}, saying{G3004}, Not so; lest{G3379} there be{G714} not{G3756} enough{G714} for us{G2254} and{G2532} you{G5213}: but{G1161} go ye{G4198} rather{G3123} to{G4314} them that sell{G4453}, and{G2532} buy{G59} for yourselves{G1438}.

And{G1161} while{G565} they{G846} went{G565} to buy{G59}, the bridegroom{G3588} came{G2064}; and{G2532} they that were ready{G2092} went in{G1525} with{G3326} him{G846} to{G1519} the marriage{G3588}: and{G2532} the door{G3588} was shut{G2808}.

But{G1161} he answered{G611} and said{G2036}, Verily{G281} I say{G3004} unto you{G5213}, I know{G1492} you{G5209} not{G3756}.
Watch{G1127} therefore{G3767}, for{G3754} ye know{G1492} neither{G3756} the day{G3588} nor{G3761} the hour{G3588} wherein{G1722} the Son{G3588} of man{G3588} cometh{G2064}.

For{G1063} the kingdom of heaven is as{G5618} a man{G444} travelling into a far country{G589}, who called{G2564} his own{G2398} servants{G1401}, and{G2532} delivered{G3860} unto them{G846} his{G846} goods{G5224}.

Then{G1161} he that had received{G2983} the five{G4002} talents{G5007} went{G4198} and traded{G2038} with{G1722} the same{G846}, and{G2532} made{G4160} them other{G243} five{G4002} talents{G5007}.

But{G1161} he that had received{G2983} one{G1520} went{G565} and digged{G3736} in{G1722} the earth{G3588}, and{G2532} hid{G613} his{G846} lord's{G3588} money{G3588}.

And so{G2532} he that had received{G2983} five{G4002} talents{G5007} came{G4334} and brought{G4374} other{G243} five{G4002} talents{G5007}, saying{G3004}, Lord{G2962}, thou deliveredst{G3860} unto me{G3427} five{G4002} talents{G5007}: behold{G1492}, I have gained{G2770} beside{G1909} them{G846} five{G4002} talents{G5007} more{G243}.

His{G846} lord{G3588} answered{G611} and said{G2036} unto him{G846}, Thou wicked{G4190} and{G2532} slothful{G3636} servant{G1401}, thou knewest{G1492} that{G3754} I reap{G2325} where{G3699} I sowed{G4687} not{G3756}, and{G2532} gather{G4863} where{G3606} I have{G1287} not{G3756} strawed{G1287}:

Thou{G4571} oughtest{G1163} therefore{G3767} to have put{G906} my{G3450} money{G3588} to the exchangers{G3588}, and{G2532} then at my coming{G2064} I{G1473} should have received{G2865} mine own{G1699} with{G4862} usury{G5110}.
Take{G142} therefore{G3767} the talent{G3588} from{G575} him{G846}, and{G2532} give{G1325} it unto him which hath{G2192} ten{G1176} talents{G5007}.

For{G1063} unto{G2192} every{G3956} one that hath{G2192} shall be given{G1325}, and{G2532} he shall have abundance{G4052}: but{G1161} from{G575} him{G846} that hath{G2192} not{G3361} shall be taken{G142} away{G575} even{G2532} that which{G3739} he hath{G2192}.
And{G2532} cast ye{G1544} the unprofitable{G888} servant{G1401} into{G1519} outer{G1857} darkness{G3588}: there{G1563} shall be{G2071} weeping{G3588} and{G2532} gnashing{G3588} of teeth{G3588}.

When{G3752} the Son{G3588} of man{G3588} shall come{G2064} in{G1722} his{G846} glory{G3588}, and{G2532} all{G3956} the{G32} holy{G40} angels{G32} with{G3326} him{G846}, then{G5119} shall he sit{G2523} upon{G1909} the throne{G2362} of{G1391} his{G846} glory{G1391}:

And{G2532} before{G1715} him{G846} shall be gathered{G4863} all{G3956} nations{G3588}: and{G2532}he shall separate{G873} them{G846} one{G240} from{G575} another{G240}, as{G5618} a shepherd{G3588} divideth{G873} his sheep{G3588} from{G575} the goats{G3588}:
And{G2532} he shall set{G2476} the sheep{G4263} on{G1537} his{G846} right hand{G1188}, but{G1161} the goats{G2055} on{G1537} the left{G2176}.

Then{G5119} shall{G2046} the King{G3588} say{G2046} unto them{G3588} on{G1537} his{G846} right hand{G1188}, Come, ye{G1205} blessed{G2127} of{G3588} my{G3450} Father{G3962}, inherit{G2816} the kingdom{G932} prepared{G2090} for you{G5213} from{G575} the foundation{G2602} of the world{G2889}:

For{G1063} I was an hungred{G3983}, and{G2532} ye gave{G1325} me{G3427} meat{G5315}: I was thirsty{G1372}, and{G2532} ye gave{G4222} me{G3165} drink{G4222}: I was{G2252} a stranger{G3581}, and{G2532} ye took{G4863} me{G3165} in{G4863}:
Naked{G1131}, and{G2532} ye clothed{G4016} me{G3165}: I was sick{G770}, and{G2532} ye visited{G1980} me{G3165}: I was{G2252} in{G1722} prison{G5438}, and{G2532} ye came{G2064} unto{G4314} me{G3165}.

Then{G5119} shall{G611} the righteous{G1342} answer{G611} him{G846}, saying{G3004}, Lord{G2962}, when{G4219} saw we{G1492} thee{G4571} an hungred{G3983}, and{G2532} fed{G5142} thee? or{G2228} thirsty{G1372}, and{G2532} thee drinkgave {G4222}?
When{G4219} saw we{G1492} thee{G4571} a stranger{G3581}, and{G2532} thee intook {G4863}? or{G2228} naked{G1131}, and{G2532} clothed{G4016} thee?
Or{G1161} when{G4219} saw we{G1492} thee{G4571} sick{G772}, or{G2228} in{G1722} prison{G5438}, and{G2532} came{G2064} unto{G4314} thee{G4571}?
